arts.ttl: Espanyol vs Atletico Madrid – Match preview and team news
arts.sum: Espanyol and Atletico Madrid go head-to-head in their La Liga opener on Sunday. Both sides will be searching for a positive start to the season, in an intriguing matchup that marks Atletico’s quest to challenge Barcelona and Real Madrid for the title.
